node.title: Jewel thieves jailed for stealing millions from celebrities
node.description: The thieves stole jewellery, cash, diamonds and precious stones from wealthy victims, including Formula One heiress Tamara Ecclestone and Chelsea soccer star Frank Lampard.
node.content:
["A gang of international jewel thieves who stole millions in gems and other valuables from wealthy victims \u2014\u00a0including Formula One heiress Tamara Ecclestone \u2014\u00a0have been\u00a0sentenced to prison by a British judge.", "Italian citizens Jugoslav Jovanovic, 24, Alessandro Maltese, 45, and Alessandro Donati, 44, raided\u00a0three London mansions during a two-week burglary spree in December 2019.", "The thieves targeted the homes of Chelsea soccer star Frank Lampard and his wife, Christine, the late Leicester City soccer club owner Vichai Srivaddhanaprabha and Tamara Ecclestone, the daughter of motor racing magnate Bernie Ecclestone.", "By far the biggest theft was at the home beside London's Hyde Park of Ecclestone, who was on vacation in Lapland with her husband, daughter and dog at the time.", "", "
Prosecutors\u00a0say\u00a0the thefts were \"the highest-value burglaries that have ever come to light\" in Britain.(Reuters: Toby Melville)
", "Police said the thieves stole jewellery, cash, diamonds and precious stones worth 25 million British pounds ($45\u00a0million).", "Prosecutor Timothy Cray said the thefts were \"the highest-value burglaries that have ever come to light\" in Britain.", "Most of the stolen money and goods have not been recovered.", "\"It's buried treasure somewhere, globally,\" said Detective Constable Andrew Payne of London's Metropolitan Police.", "", "
The home of Chelsea soccer star Frank Lampard and his wife, Christine, was also targeted by the thieves.\u00a0\u00a0(Reuters: John Sibley)
", "After being tracked down by British detectives, the three suspects\u00a0were extradited from Italy and\u00a0pleaded guilty to conspiracy to burgle.", "Maltese and Donati were each sentenced to eight years and nine months in prison by a judge at Isleworth Crown Court in west London.", "Jovanovic, who additionally admitted to laundering money, received an 11-year sentence.", "The three will be sent to Italy to serve their sentences.", "British prosecutors say a fourth suspect, Serbian Daniel Vukovic, was \"the prime mover\" behind the burglaries.", "UK\u00a0authorities have tried and failed to have him extradited from Serbia to face charges.", "ABC/AP"]
